creator: Revic Optics
descriptionHtml: Create, store and load ballistic profiles for PMR 4.5-28x56mm by providing custom parameters such as caliber, barrel twist, sight height, zero distance and muzzle velocity. App contains an ammo library that provides ballistic coeffients and bullet length based on caliber. Profiles can then programmed to the PMR via a Bluetooth connection.
descriptionShort: Revic Loader App for programming PMR riflescope.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bug squashing, UI and performance improvement.
User now can change and update the environmental data directly in ballistic module after manually inputing the elevation data. Quick scroll for the range input (increment by 100) in the ballistic module is activated by tapping, number will automatically revert to the increment by 1 after quick scroll end.

Note: Tablet form factor is currently not supported.

title: Revic Ops

creator: Revic Optics
descriptionHtml: Create, store and load ballistic profiles for PMR 4.5-28x56mm by providing custom parameters such as caliber, barrel twist, sight height, zero distance and muzzle velocity. appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We added more features to the Revic Ops:
- Improvement to ballistic engine
- Shoot to range computation for the ballistic turret

UX/UI improvement and bugs squashing.
- Copying profile functionality is added and accessible by the left swipe on profile list screen.
- Indicator on the profile list when "Ballistic Turret" feature is enabled.

Internal update and refactoring for stability, performance, and support for future products.

Note: Tablet form are not currently supported.

title: Revic Ops

creator: Revic Optics
descriptionHtml:
The new Revic Optics Ballistics Engine features a Ballistic Solver that uses a Modified Point Mass Solution (4 Degrees Of Freedom, or 4 DOF) backed by doppler verified ammunition ballistics. The cutting-edge ballistic calculator provides accurate shooting solutions by either ballistic coefficient (G1, G7) or drag coefficient based on doppler radar analysis of select bullets. A library with common, high performance bullets is included in the app and new projectiles are added automatically.

The Revic Ops App works as both a powerful stand alone ballistic calculator and also for managing Revic devices such as rangefinders and smart rifle scopes by creating, storing and loading profiles directly from the Revic Ops app via Bluetooth. Profiles include caliber, barrel twist, sight height, muzzle velocity and more. Two-way bluetooth communication allows Revic devices to provide real-time information like station pressure, temperature and more back to the Revic Ops app ballistic calculator.


Module Based Features include:
- Profile Management
Create and store unique rifle and ammunition profiles, shareable with
other users through QR Codes.
Select ammunition profiles from more than 950+ doppler backed
datasets.
- Ballistic Calculator
Real Time calculations account for:
Environmental conditions (temp, humidity, pressure, elevation),
Azimuth and Angle of Attack, Wind Speed, Earth (Coriolis), Spin Drift,
and Aero Jump.
- Weather Station
Query National Weather Service Data based on GPS positioning.
Sync or manually enter weather data into the Ballistic Calculator.
- Truing Profiles
Calculate Muzzle Velocity and Ballistic Coefficients based on truing
data at 2 known distances.
Update Ballistic Profiles with calculated Truing Data.
- Sync Device
Connect Revic Optics smart devices to upload Ballistic Profiles.
Sync data among shoot/hunting teams across devices.
- Live View of PMR HUD
Real Time updates of PMR Smart Scope Heads Up Display (HUD).
Live ballistic calculation updates of Elevation and Windage based on
Azimuth, Wind Speed and Distance and current turret positions.
descriptionShort: The Revics Ops App is a Ballistics Calculator for Long Range applications.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Whats New:

***To keep your existing profiles before updating you must upload your profile data to the cloud (sign up for Revic account), then manually press the upload button (cloud icon button) which is accessible by a left swipe on each profile***

- Improve data framework for profile management and feature expansion
- Profile sharing through QR codes
- Better account management
- Tool tips added
- Device upgrade framework improvements
- Improvements to the Ballistic Calculator

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bug fixing and performance improvement in the following areas:
- BLE communication protocol upgrade
- Prevent screen going to sleep during the firmware upgrade
- Profile sharing QR enhancement to address issue with QR image reading
- Improvement for profile creation in metric system

Note: Tablet form factor is not supported.

data at 2 known distances.
Update Ballistic Profiles with calculated Truing Data.
- Sync Device
Connect Revic Optics smart devices to upload Ballistic Profiles.
Sync data among shoot/hunting teams across devices.
- Live View of PMR HUD
Real Time updates of PMR Smart Scope Heads Up Display (HUD).
Live ballistic calculation updates of Elevation and Windage based on
Azimuth, Wind Speed and Distance and current turret positions.
descriptionShort: The Revics Ops App is a Ballistics Calculator for Long Range applications.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Updated navigation UI to include back preview gesture and quick links to the other modules.
- Bug fixes and improvement.


Note: Tablet form factor is not supported

title: Revic Ops

creator: Revic Optics
descriptionHtml:
The new Revic Optics Ballistics Engine features a Ballistic Solver that uses a Modified Point Mass Solution (4 Degrees Of Freedom, or 4 DOF) backed by doppler verified ammunition ballistics. The cutting-edge ballistic calculator provides accurate shooting solutions by either ballistic coefficient (G1, G7) or drag coefficient based on doppler radar analysis of select bullets. A library with common, high performance bullets is included in the app and new projectiles are added automatically.

The Revic Ops App works as both a powerful stand alone ballistic calculator and also for managing Revic devices such as rangefinders and smart rifle scopes by creating, storing and loading profiles directly from the Revic Ops app via Bluetooth. Profiles include caliber, barrel twist, sight height, muzzle velocity and more. Two-way bluetooth communication allows Revic devices to provide real-time information like station pressure, temperature and more back to the Revic Ops app ballistic calculator.


Module Based Features include:
- Profile Management
Create and store unique rifle and ammunition profiles, shareable with
other users through QR Codes.
Select ammunition profiles from more than 950+ doppler backed
datasets.
- Ballistic Calculator
Real Time calculations account for:
Environmental conditions (temp, humidity, pressure, elevation),
Azimuth and Angle of Attack, Wind Speed, Earth (Coriolis), Spin Drift,
and Aero Jump.
- Weather Station
Query National Weather Service Data based on GPS positioning.
Sync or manually enter weather data into the Ballistic Calculator.
- Truing Profiles
Calculate Muzzle Velocity and Ballistic Coefficients based on truing
data at 2 known distances.
Update Ballistic Profiles with calculated Truing Data.
- Sync Device
Connect Revic Optics smart devices to upload Ballistic Profiles.
Sync data among shoot/hunting teams across devices.
- Live View of PMR HUD
Real Time updates of PMR Smart Scope Heads Up Display (HUD).
Live ballistic calculation updates of Elevation and Windage based on
Azimuth, Wind Speed and Distance and current turret positions.
descriptionShort: The Revics Ops App is a Ballistics Calculator for Long Range applications.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bug fixes and improvement.

Note: Tablet form factor is not supported

descriptionHtml:
The new Revic Optics Ballistics Engine features a Ballistic Solver that uses a Modified Point Mass Solution (4 Degrees Of Freedom, or 4 DOF) backed by doppler verified ammunition ballistics. The cutting-edge ballistic calculator provides accurate shooting solutions by either ballistic coefficient (G1, G7) or drag coefficient based on doppler radar analysis of select bullets. A library with common, high performance bullets is included in the app and new projectiles are added automatically.

The Revic Ops App works as both a powerful stand alone ballistic calculator and also for managing Revic devices such as rangefinders and smart rifle scopes by creating, storing and loading profiles directly from the Revic Ops app via Bluetooth. Profiles include caliber, barrel twist, sight height, muzzle velocity and more. Two-way bluetooth communication allows Revic devices to provide real-time information like station pressure, temperature and more back to the Revic Ops app ballistic calculator.


Module Based Features include:
- Profile Management
Create and store unique rifle and ammunition profiles, shareable with
other users through QR Codes.
Select ammunition profiles from more than 950+ doppler backed
datasets.
- Ballistic Calculator
Real Time calculations account for:
Environmental conditions (temp, humidity, pressure, elevation),
Azimuth and Angle of Attack, Wind Speed, Earth (Coriolis), Spin Drift,
and Aero Jump.
- Weather Station
Query National Weather Service Data based on GPS positioning.
Sync or manually enter weather data into the Ballistic Calculator.
- Truing Profiles
Calculate Muzzle Velocity and Ballistic Coefficients based on truing
data at 2 known distances.
Update Ballistic Profiles with calculated Truing Data.
- Sync Device
Connect Revic Optics smart devices to upload Ballistic Profiles.
Sync data among shoot/hunting teams across devices.
- Live View of PMR HUD
Real Time updates of PMR Smart Scope Heads Up Display (HUD).
Live ballistic calculation updates of Elevation and Windage based on
Azimuth, Wind Speed and Distance and current turret positions.
descriptionShort: The Revics Ops App is a Ballistics Calculator for Long Range applications.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixing UI bugs and performance improvements.
